channel.title: Shapefile on Matthew Haffner
channel.description: Recent content in Shapefile on Matthew Haffner

item.title: The development of shp2nosql
item.description: In the early days of my dissertation, I was collecting Twitter data but had no idea how to store, manage, or query these data. First, I tried PostgreSQL with PostGIS. I had been wanting to learn PostGIS anyway, not to mention a suitable alternative to MS SQL Server. After learning PostGIS’s intricacies, I soon found it was unsuitable for my needs. After some searching, I stumbled upon MongoDB. Subsequently, I started using MongoDB to handle my data.
